title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 602 - College Finance and Business Operations (college Operating Fund)
content:

Statutory authority: Education Law,, §, §355, 6221, 6302, 6304, 6305; L. 1984, ch. 762;L. 1993, ch. 53 as amd. by L. 1993, ch. 259; L. 1995, chs. 50, 53; L. 1997, chs. 53, 389; L. 1998, chs. 53, 58; L. 1999, ch. 405; L. 2001, chs. 53, 149; L. 2004, chs. 53, 411; L. 2005, ch. 53; L. 2006, ch. 53; L. 2007, ch. 53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
